00038 typedef Meta::list<RangeServerClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;

00040 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00041   try {
00042     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00043 
00044     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00045     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00046     InetAddr addr(get_str("rs-host"), get_i16("rs-port"));
00047     int timeout = get_i32("timeout");
00048 
00049     conn_mgr->add(addr, timeout, "Range Server");
00050 
00051     if (!conn_mgr->wait_for_connection(addr, timeout))
00052       HT_THROWF(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "connecting to range server %s",
00053                 addr.format().c_str());
00054 
00055     RangeServerClient *client = new RangeServerClient(comm, timeout);
00056     RangeServerStat stat;
00057 
00058     client->get_statistics(addr, stat);
00059 
00060     std::cout << stat << std::endl;
00061   }
00062   catch (Exception &e) {
00063     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00064     _exit(1);   // don't bother with static objects
00065   }
00066   _exit(0);     // ditto
00067 }
